title: Financials
content:
This page contains association historical financials. The WKBCA expenses and overall finances are governed by a statement of intend the association board approved via resolution. The statement is as follows: "It is the goal of the WKBCA Board to manage expenses such that the HOA dues can be set at the lowest possible level, while maintaining a beautiful neighborhood and planning for reasonable contingencies with healthy a reserve. This will be accomplished through prudent management of association finances, negotiating best cost with high quality services where a vendor or provider is required and encouraging volunteerism within the community to maintain and serve the neighborhood, avoiding third-party expenses where possible."

All historical financials can be found here: WKBCA Historical Financials
